description: Enjoy a peaceful rowboat ride on Aasee Lake, surrounded by beautiful greenery.

locationInfo.description: A relaxing experience where you can row across Münster’s famous lake and take in the fresh air.
safetyTips: Wear a life jacket for safety.
Be aware of other boats on the lake.

description: Take a leisurely walk through Prinzipalmarkt while enjoying locally made ice cream.

locationInfo.description: A charming stroll through Münster’s historic shopping street, featuring stunning architecture and cozy cafés.
safetyTips: Watch for cyclists in shared spaces.

description: Discover exotic plants and flowers in the Münster Botanical Garden.

locationInfo.description: A tranquil walk through beautifully maintained gardens with a diverse collection of plant species.
safetyTips: Stay on designated paths to protect plant life.
Bring a camera for nature photography.
Wear light, breathable clothing for warm weather.

description: Relax by the Torminbrücke bridge and enjoy a beautiful sunset over the canal.

locationInfo.description: A scenic spot along the Dortmund-Ems Canal, ideal for a peaceful break and sunset watching.
safetyTips: Bring a light sweater for cooler evening temperatures.
Sit on the benches for a comfortable view.
Be mindful of cyclists passing by.

description: Enjoy a fun round of mini golf at the beautiful Wienburgpark.

locationInfo.description: A casual outdoor activity in a green setting, perfect for a friendly competition.
safetyTips: Wear comfortable shoes for walking between holes.
Have fun and keep score for a friendly challenge!
